Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 12th overall pick, by Syracuse in 1975...
Traded from Syracuse to Wisconsin on 3/2/1975 (Going to SYR: 1B G. Davis. Going to WIS: 1B D. Gibbens)...
Had first career hit (homerun) on 4/2/1978, off Andres Echeverria (NE)...
Won Outstanding Newcomer Award in 1978, hitting .253 with 18 HR, 64 RBI...
Hit for the cycle against Minnesota on 4/1/1980...
Was selected to the 1981 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/21/1981, hitting .542 with 3 HR, 8 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 0 RBI against Pittsburgh on 8/4/1981...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/11/1981, hitting .593 with 1 HR, 4 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Columbus on 9/3/1981...
Drove in 6 runs against Pittsburgh on 4/26/1982...
Won Batter of the Month award on 5/1/1982, hitting .390 with 5 HR, 18 RBI...
Was selected to the 1982 Allstar game...
Hit 3 homeruns against Manchester, driving in 6 runs on 7/15/1982...
Won Batter of the Month award on 5/1/1984, hitting .383 with 6 HR, 30 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/12/1984, hitting .600 with 3 HR, 8 RBI...
Was selected to the 1984 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/2/1985, hitting .536 with 3 HR, 9 RBI...
Was selected to the 1985 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Malibu on 5/18/1986...
Won Batter of the Month award on 7/1/1986, hitting .388 with 10 HR, 27 RBI...
Was selected to the 1986 Allstar game...
Hit for the cycle against Minnesota on 8/18/1986...
Had 5 hits with 5 RBI against Minnesota on 8/18/1986...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/25/1986, hitting .560 with 1 HR, 7 RBI...
Won Outstanding Batter Award in 1986, hitting .336 with 26 HR, 106 RBI...
Was selected to the 1988 Allstar game...
